title: STZY Tubeless Repair Kit integrates CO2 inflator head into compact 38g package
content:
STZY Products have released a new tubeless tire repair kit for road, gravel and mountain bikers. The compact aluminium casing houses a tire plugger and a built-in CO2 inflator, carrying everything you need to repair a tubeless tire puncture in a matter of minutes within a neat 38g package. Here’s more. STZY Tubeless Repair and […]

The post STZY Tubeless Repair Kit integrates CO2 inflator head into compact 38g package appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
